node.title: Germany is investigating vaccine opponents over a plot to kill a state governor.
node.alt: Police officers block the entrance to the Saxony Parliament building in Dresden, Germany, during a protest against pandemic measures.
node.content: ["BERLIN \u2014 The authorities in the eastern German city of Dresden said Wednesday that they had seized weapons after searching the homes of a group of vaccine opponents who they said had planned to kill the state governor of Saxony over his support for coronavirus measures.", "Five men and one woman, aged 32 to 64, are being investigated, the prosecutor\u2019s office in Dresden, the capital of Saxony, confirmed on Wednesday. The authorities said the group communicated their plans to kill the governor, Michael Kretschmer, over the Telegram messenger service. A public broadcaster reported about the alleged plot last week.", "Among the weapons found were a gun and several crossbows, officials said.", "They said the suspects met in a group chat called \u201cDresden offline networking\u201d and shared material that was critical of vaccinations and of the lockdown measures that German states have used to try to stop the spread of the virus.", "Saxony has the lowest vaccination rate and one of the highest coronavirus case rates among German states, and Mr. Kretschmer has backed strict precautions. Thousands of people in the state have set off on nightly \u201cwalks\u201d to protest both restrictions and vaccinations, and the demonstrations have recently become more violent."]
